extendedInfo.description: Hit Me Up - Flirt,Chat,Meet,Date- lets you exchange Instant Messenger's ID compatible with Kik Messenger, Skype, Yahoo Messenger, KakaoTalk and Line. Name any purpose you want - for dating, flirting, meet new people, random chat roullette, make friends... Anything is possible by exchanging Instant Messenger ID. It's 100% FREE!Hit Me Up -Flirt,Chat,Meet,Date- is a 100% FREE online app dating site where you can post messages, browse posts, and flirt with thousands of people in real-time through Instant Messenger. Post your IM's ID and just wait for someone to chat you on any tool - Kik Messenger, Skype, Yahoo Messenger, KakaoTalk, or Line. Let's find out and start dating with interesting people around you!By downloading this application, you can: â¤ Post Unlimited Messages for FREEâ¤ Complete and list your profiles with picture for FREEâ¤ Browse and flirt with people from all over the world for FREEâ¤ Contact anyone for dating, flirting through IM for FREEâ¤ Create your chat rooms for FREEâ¤ Chat with your matches through IM for FREEâ¤ Meet People for FREEWhy paying money on dating apps / flirting apps like Flirtomatic, Zoosk, Miumeet when you have a dating community site, can meet new people and flirt for 100% FREE? Why do you have to pay for finding new friends? NOW You can do it for 100% FREE! Start flirting!Enjoy your dating game, meet me with this Dating Apps Free!!Notesâ¦â Millions of singles are dating & flirting on IM Dating.â Supports Kik Messenger, KakaoTalk, Skype, LINE, YahooIM ID for dating with girls & guys nearby!â Straight, gay, lesbians: designed for everyone who wants to meet new people.â Please install Chat apps beforehand.Please Note: * You have to agree to our Terms of Use & Privacy Policy before using our service.* 18+ Only* Profile pictures will be screened before it appears on search result for safer community building.* Posted contents will be patrolled 24/7 for objectionable postings.* Accounts that violate our terms of use & privacy policy will be deleted.* This app has no relation to Kik Messenger nor Kik Interactive, Inc.* This app has no relation to Yahoo! Messenger nor Yahoo, Inc.* This app has no relation to LINE nor NHN Japan, Inc.* This app has no relation to KakaoTalk Messenger nor KAKAO, Inc.* This app has no relation to Skype nor Skype, Inc.

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: ok at first I was in love with this app BUT now, it sucks. my posts don\'t go up to the feed nor do they show up in \"Edit Past Messages\"... dafuq?
reviews.author: Amber White

reviews.title: Cant Post
reviews.comment: I loved the app except it randomly stopped letting me post! I cant post anything :( Can you fix this please ?! Otherwise +5
reviews.author: Nene Raquel

reviews.title: Not a lot of matches.
reviews.comment: Maybe I was doing something wrong, but I could not get more then 3 profiles 2 come up, and I was leaving the criteria very open.
reviews.author: Curtis Hinton

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Its an pretty good app but its only getting 3 stars till y\'all remove the fakes and spam that posts all the time that is reported. Fix that and ill give 5 stars
reviews.author: brian T

reviews.title: Love it a lot great app!!!
reviews.comment: I wish you would allow the app to turn sideways when you tip your phone on its side as opposed to always staying straight up its annoying change it then I will bring back the one start.

reviews.title: Photo Verification Delay
reviews.comment: It\'s been 48 Hours, what took you so long to get my photo on live?

reviews.title: loading time
reviews.comment: its a good.app just needs to load faster past first screen apart from that its ok

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It works great. I love meeting ppl. Its easy I wish it wouldnt take so long to verify picts and I wish every one had to havr a pict and that u could makr multiple selections on race like on age

reviews.comment: I REALLY LIKE THIS APP IT\'S FAST AND EASY TO USE.

reviews.comment: It hasnt worked for me for about a month now. It keeps saying something is wrong. Whats the big issue?

reviews.title: Network error!
reviews.comment: I can\'t connect! It\'s not my internet. Please fix. Sometimes I can connect but lately no.

reviews.title: It\'s pretty cool
reviews.comment: It has a lot of bugs the new update kinda makes the app worse. When your looking for your age group when you scroll down to view others it pops up a page and says undefined! Please fix I\'ll wait it four stars!!!

reviews.title: Decent app
reviews.comment: It\'s really good for meeting people in your area to chat with but if kik ids are too long you can\'t see them which sucks. Beyond that it would be nice if the buttons opened directly into a new chat with the user instead of simply launching the app.

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: This is rubbish, when I first used it a few weeks ago, I was getting reply and chatting now. No reply no chatting nothing. Is this working or it it broken
